name: Peter World
description: This is Peter World Game, a game similar to Mario World, which has a lot of adventures and actions, good game-play. Peter, a solitary character that you go through many adventures in beautiful and great stages in a Pixel-Art open world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP , 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel or AMD 2 G.hertz Memory: 2 MB RAM Graphics: onboard video or better Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card: Windows default sound Additional Notes: This game does not need DirectX
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP , 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel or AMD 3 G.hertz Memory: 2 MB RAM Graphics: 9800 GT 1GB or higher Recent Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Windows default sound Additional Notes: This game does not need DirectX
